LanguageData.VG_Campfire.label: bamboo campfire
LanguageData.VG_Campfire.description: Cooks meals and produces heat. Burns out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
LanguageData.VG_Campfire_Blueprint.label: bamboo campfire (blueprint)
LanguageData.VG_Campfire_Frame.label: bamboo campfire (building)
LanguageData.VG_Campfire_Frame.description: Cooks meals and produces heat. Burns out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
